greektext:
base edition: ed.pr.

Greek text in Unicode


01     yolokompia
02     Getas


01     ψολοκο̣[μπία]
02     Γέτας
contents: remains of a list of words, consisting of two words derived from a context of comedy: one of them is a new attestation of the hapax ??????????, only known from Aristophanes (Eq. 696) and from some lexicographers and scholiasts.
statepreservation: convex side:  2 lines, each with only one word; the ostracon is broken off at the top and to the right. Left-hand margin is about 1 cm while there is a large empty space at the bottom of at least 3.5 cm.
hand: large, irregular, slightly slanting to the left; the epsilon is ligatured; probably 'evolving' or advanced student's hand
